src:
収容直前で逃走した女、身柄確保…検察事務官をはねた息子も

01 Nov 2019, 03:31

　大阪府岸和田市の大阪地検岸和田支部で刑事施設への収容手続き中だった岡崎公栄（きみえ）被告（４９）が男の車で逃走した事件で、大阪地検は１日午前、岡崎被告と男を同府和泉市内で発見し、身柄を確保した。地検が発表した。
　男は岡崎被告の息子で、野口仁容疑者（３０）。地検は野口容疑者について、逃走時に検察事務官をはねたとする公務執行妨害と傷害の両容疑で逮捕した。
　地検などによると、岡崎被告は１０月３０日午前、保釈を取り消され、収容手続きのため、同支部を訪れた。検察官から収容に関する説明を受けた際、「車に荷物を取りに行きたい」と求め、検察事務官４人と支部前の車に移動。助手席に乗り込んだ直後、野口容疑者が車を急発進させ、制止しようとした検察事務官の男性をはね、逃走した。事務官は両手に軽いけがを負った。
　岡崎被告は昨年７月、大阪府和泉市で、無免許運転の車で児童（当時８歳）をはねたとして今年２月に自動車運転死傷行為処罰法違反（無免許過失運転致傷）などで起訴され、大阪地裁岸和田支部で公判中だった。３月に保釈されたが、５月の初公判後、出廷しなくなったため、保釈が取り消された。
text:
A woman who ran away just before the containment, securing the personality ... The son who hit the prosecutor's office

01 Nov 2019, 03:31

Okazaki Koei (49), who was in the process of detention at the Osaka District Prosecution Wada Branch in Kishiwada City, Osaka, escaped with a man's car. Was found in Izumi city, Dobu, and secured personality. The prosecution announced.
The man is the son of Defendant Okazaki and Jin Noguchi (30). The district prosecutor arrested Noguchi for alleged obstruction of public servants and injury that hit the prosecutor's office during the runaway.
According to the district prosecutor, Okazaki defender was released on bail on the morning of October 30 and visited the branch for detention procedures. When the prosecutor explained about the containment, he asked, “I want to go to the car to pick up my baggage” and moved to the car in front of the branch with four prosecutors. Immediately after boarding the passenger seat, Noguchi succumbed to a prosecutor's office man who suddenly started the car and tried to stop it. The clerk was slightly injured in both hands.
Defendant Okazaki in Izumi City, Osaka last July, for a violation of the Act on Punishment for Car Driving Injury and Punishment Act (unlicensed negligence injuries caused by unlicensed driving) He was charged and was in trial at the Kishiwada branch of the Osaka District Court. He was released on bail in March, but after his first trial in May, he went out of court.
